name: Elemental Siege
description:
Elemental Siege In a world where the jinn guard the balance of the elements with their powers, a shadow is looming over elemental magic; Iblis, has begun leading the dhiib, hungry for the control of the elements of the jinn. Nasnas, master of the three elemental powers: Fire, Water and Electricity, must defeat Iblis and his army of dhiib in order to free the jinn who have been imprisoned in the Elemental Court. Join Nasnas in this adventure to defeat Iblis and his allies. It won't be easy, but remember: Elemental magic is on your side. Developers
  • Marta Croche Trigo
  • Víctor Manuel Estremera Herranz
  • Menggen Hu 
  • Paula Morillas Alonso 
  • Elena Robert Núñez
Assets (Linked below)
  • Background and decorations by 7Soul on GameDev Market
  • Other decorations by Szadiart on GameDev Market
  • Elemental reactions and water attack by NYKNCK on itch.io
  • Guards and Iblis by Finalbossblues on itch.io
  • Slimes by Calciumtrice on OpenGameArt.com
  • Doors by Lanea Zimmerman (AKA Sharm)
  • Music from the Unity Asset store
  • Sound effects from OpenGameArt.com
